verses.verse: In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, in the one and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H559><s%> now to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Who is <S%H7604>left<s%> among you that <S%H7200>saw<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> in its <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%>? and how do ye <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H5869>now<s%>? is it not in your eyes as <S%H3644>nothing<s%>?

Yet now be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, O <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, O <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>; and be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, all ye <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6213>work<s%>: for I am with <S%H5002>you<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>,

according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> with you when ye <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5975>abode<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3372>you<s%>: fear ye not.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: Yet <S%H259>once<s%>, it is a little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the dry <S%H2724>land<s%>;

and I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and the precious things of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>; and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H3519>glory<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2091>mine<s%>, and the gold is <S%H5002>mine<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

The <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be greater <S%H1419>than<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and in this <S%H4725>place<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

In the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8147>month<s%>, in the second <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%>, came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> now the <S%H3548>priests<s%> concerning the <S%H8451>law<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

If <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of his <S%H899>garment<s%>, and with his <S%H3671>skirt<s%> do <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, or <S%H5138>pottage<s%>, or <S%H3196>wine<s%>, or <S%H8081>oil<s%>, or any <S%H3978>food<s%>, shall it become <S%H6942>holy<s%>? And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, No.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%>, If one that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a dead <S%H5315>body<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> any of <S%H2930>these<s%>, shall it be unclean? And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, It shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, So is this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and so is this <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and so is every <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; and that which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> there is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

And <S%H7760>now<s%>, I pray you, consider from this <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H4605>backward<s%>, <S%H2962>before<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> was <S%H7760>laid<s%> upon a <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Through all that <S%H935>time<s%>, when one came to a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H6235>measures<s%>, there were but ten; when one <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3342>winevat<s%> to draw <S%H2834>out<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6333>vessels<s%>, there were but <S%H6242>twenty<s%>.

I <S%H5221>smote<s%> you with <S%H7711>blasting<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew<s%> and with <S%H1259>hail<s%> in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>; yet ye turned not to <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Consider <S%H7760><s%>, I pray <S%H3117>you<s%>, from this day and <S%H4605>backward<s%>, from the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H3117>month<s%>, since the day that the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1964>temple<s%> was <S%H7760>laid<s%>, consider it.

Is the <S%H2233>seed<s%> yet in the <S%H4035>barn<s%>? <S%H1612>yea<s%>, the vine, and the <S%H6086>fig-tree<s%>, and the <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, and the <S%H8384>olive<s%> - <S%H8384>tree<s%> have not brought <S%H5375>forth<s%>; from this <S%H3117>day<s%> will I bless <S%H1288>you<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came the <S%H8145>second<s%> time unto <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Speak <S%H559><s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

and I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>; and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2392>strength<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%>, and those that <S%H7392>ride<s%> in <S%H5483>them<s%>; and the horses and their <S%H7392>riders<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, will I <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2216>thee<s%>, O Zerubbabel, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and will <S%H7760>make<s%> thee as a <S%H2368>signet<s%>; for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
